sentences.english: The girl aped the way the movie star fixed her hair.
sentences.chinese: 这女孩子模仿影星的发式。

sentences.english: Hollywood can make the most famous film stars in the world.
sentences.chinese: 好莱坞可以造就世界上最著名的影星。

sentences.english: The movie star was warmly cheered as he got on the stage.
sentences.chinese: 这位影星登上舞台时受到人们的热烈欢呼。

sentences.english: His early efforts to copy other famous stars at that time were a failure.
sentences.chinese: 他早期为模仿当时其他著名影星的努力均告失败。

sentences.english: Hemingway was as handsome as a film star , Bogart as sophisticated as a writer .
sentences.chinese: 海明威英俊好比影星，而鲍嘉睿智有如作家。

sentences.english: I am not a worshiper of that film star.
A wealthy man fruitfully married a beautiful female movie star.
sentences.chinese: 一名富翁如愿以偿地娶到了一位美丽的女影星。

sentences.english: The fans surged forward to the the movie star.
sentences.chinese: 影迷们汹涌地奔去看那个影星。

sentences.english: Fans thronged to the entrance of the theatre to see the famous actress.
sentences.chinese: 影迷们拥向剧院的入口争睹著名女影星。

sentences.english: The famous movie stars swept in and astonished the guests.
sentences.chinese: 著名的影星昂然走了进来，使客人们大为吃惊。

sentences.english: She is a Chinese TV star and famous for acting as a policewoman.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位以扮演警花而闻名遐迩的中国影星。

sentences.english: The famous actress breathed her last.
sentences.chinese: 那位著名的女影星咽气了。

sentences.english: From my perspective, Zhang’s fault lies in her unique role, a world-famous star.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，章子怡错就错在她是一个世界级的影星。

sentences.english: The stars drove through streets heaving with frantic fans.
sentences.chinese: 影星们驾车在街道上驶过，疯狂的影迷们狂呼高喊。

sentences.english: Ann wants to be a movie star, because she is very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 安长大后想当一名影星，因为她非常漂亮。

sentences.english: Regular exercise helps the film star get into shape and keep a slim figure.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼帮助那位影星强身健体，并保持苗条身材。

definition: currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
to succeed in life/to become somebody
Jackie Chan (1954-), kungfu film and Cantopop star
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
Gong Li (1965-), PRC female film star
